emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_table

Class AttrTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_table.AttrTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class AttrTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Table model running the manual attribute selector table. Responsibilities include displaying all attributes for the current dataset and communicating with the controller when attribute values change.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
